Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>You're back! All right!


The course continues to be a hair too
groundbreaking to attract any customers.

But every time you turn up, it makes me
think that all this grueling, strenuous
labor was completely worth it!
Talk64:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Uh-oh. It looks like you've got as many
bows as you can carry.
Talk48:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>From noon till noon! It's smiiiles all
the time!
Talk65:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'll give you some arrows for your
next attempt.
Talk49:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>From midnight till midnight! It's smiiiles
all the time!
Talk66:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I wanted to give you a wooden bow, so
please make some space in your pouch.
Talk67:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I wanted to give you a traveler's bow, so
please make some space in your pouch.
Talk68:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I wanted to give you a soldier’s bow, so
please make some space in your pouch.
Talk69:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Did you make some space in your pouch?
Then I've got a prize for you!
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>You pick up a lot of speed on this course!
Make sure you're ready for anythin' when
ya get in the cart!
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're not ready, please get down from
the cart.
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>From mornin' till mornin'! It's smiiiles all
the time!
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All right, let's start the game!<sp:5:0:0> Give me just
a minute to get the targets set up.
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>I just knew you'd come!


Turning Death Mountain into a mine-cart
course is a pretty groundbreaking idea,
if I do say so myself!
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was hoping it could be Mine-Cart Land's
main attraction...

But the idea is so groundbreaking that
I haven't drawn a single customer.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>Which makes you...<sp:5:0:0>my very first!
Talk50:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>All through the day and all through the
night, it's smiiiles all the time!
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>To celebrate your mountain-climbing
courage, I'll let you play for free!

I'm not skimping on the arrows either.
You've earned 'em!
Talk52:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Pretty cool, huh?


You should take that cloth southeast to
the <clr:0000>dye shop <clr:ffff>in <clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>. I'm sure
they can make it even cooler!
Talk19:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>I...didn't think anyone would be able to
clear my course.

I gotta say...<sp:5:0:0> You're incredible.
Talk36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>The game costs <clr:0000>20 rupees<clr:ffff> to play. <sp:5:0:0>For
<clr:0000>50 rupees<clr:ffff>, you get 10 arrows too!
Talk53:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>It'd be great if ya took another shot at
my brothers' courses in the Southern
Mine as well.
They're looking forward to seeing some
new high scores!
Talk70:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I wanted to give you a prize for being an
ace carter, but looks like your pouch
is full.
Talk37:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>This is a super-hard course only for
serious carters!

And since you cleared my brothers'
courses, I imagine you'll take it on with
a smile!
You, uh, wouldn't have come all this way
if you weren't gonna play, right?
Talk54:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Hey, where are you going? I'll have to end
the game if you leave Death Mountain!
Talk55:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Since you left before the game was over
last time, I'll give you one more shot at
it for free!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>A... A new record?!


How did you get a score that high on a
course this tough?!
Talk73:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That's a bummer. But come back and play
again sometime!
Talk56:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>Three words of advice for clearing this
course—prepare, prepare, prepare!

Bring your favorite bow and arrows,
change the mine cart however you like—
give yourself every advantage you can!
Really think things over and come back as
soon as you're ready!
Talk74:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you wanna keep playing, then get back
over here!
Talk57:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM_00>I...<sp:5:0:0>didn't think that score was possible.<sp:0:4:0>Goron or Hylian, I've never seen anyone
handle a mine cart like you!
Talk58:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>The rules are simple.<sp:5:0:0>


Ride the cart down Death Mountain,
shooting as many targets as you can,
and <clr:0000>reach the goal<clr:ffff> within the time limit!
Ya do tend to pick up a lot of speed
racing down a mountain though, so
watch out for that!
Talk59:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseM_00>Y-<sp:5:0:0>you popped every single one of them!


You're better at cartin' than any Goron!<sp:5:0:0>
No, more than that...

You're the greatest carter in the world!
Talk77:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Sorry, but you're out.<sp:0:4:0>Next time you play, try not to fall out of
the cart!
Talk78: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>Sorry, but you're out.<sp:0:4:0>Be careful to stay on the track next time!
Talk79:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Are you going somewhere?<sp:5:0:0> If you stray
too far, the game will end!
Talk03:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_00>What? But... But ya climbed this
whole mountain...
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>What an amazing record!


I never thought I'd see a record like
this one!
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>The rules are simple as can be!<sp:5:1:0>


Shoot <clr:0000>at least <sp:2:2:42:3c0047006f0072006f006e005f004d0069006e006900470061006d0065005f00300033005f00500061007300730069006e006700530063006f0072006500ffff00cd> <clr:ffff>targets while riding
the cart down Death Mountain, and <clr:0000>reach
the goal <clr:ffff>within the time limit to win!
Ya do tend to pick up a lot of speed
racing down a mountain though, so
watch out for that!
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Ease_00>Oooh, bad luck there.


But I did design this course to be super
difficult. The challenge is part of the fun!
Talk05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>You'll be using my personal mine cart.<sp:5:0:0>
No other carts allowed.
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Put the mine cart on the track, <clr:0000>get in<clr:ffff>,
<clr:0000>and the game will begin<clr:ffff>.
Talk23:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_00>If ya wanna score high, ya gotta prep.
Especially for a course this tough.

You can strategize by carefully picking
your bow and arrows<sp:5:0:0> or modifying the
mine cart to suit your needs!
Talk07: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting_01>Got any questions? I'm happy to answer!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>We'll always be happy to welcome you
back to Mine-Cart Land. <sp:5:0:0>Even happier if
you shock us with the highest record!
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All right, take some time to get prepared,
and climb aboard the mine cart!
Talk25: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Hey, no!<sp:5:0:0> You can't take my cart with you!
Talk42: <sp:3:0:2:0000>Get as ready as you need to!
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>You're only allowed to use my mine cart
while you're playing the game.
Talk43: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>What are ya doing to my cart?!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_00>Hey! You have to stay in the cart!<sp:5:0:0> Sorry,
but you're disqualified!
Talk61:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>At the end of the day, I want you to have
fun, <sp:5:0:0>so I'll let you try it for free just one
more time.
Talk62:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Perfect! I was just hoping for a
conversation partner.
Talk45: <sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>Sorry, you're a little short on funds there.
